text:
e="preserve">Charlotte Tillar Schexnayder (December 25, 1923 – December 11, 2020) was an American journalist and politician. She was a member of the Arkansas House of Representatives from the 74th district from 1985 to 1999. She was born in Tillar, Arkansas. Schexnayder was a member of the Democratic Party.
Schexnayder died on December 11, 2020 in Little Rock, Arkansas at the age of 96.
